post.body: loves having long chats with Josh and Mikey!! Time for bed ... G'night!!!
Turkey sandwich.
is busily working on the book!
doesn't like the orange Sour Patch Kids.
Chinese food = Yummmmmm
is not a very happy camper right now ...
Have you ever been too sleepy to actually go to bed? That's how I am right now ...
Wow ... "The {Re} Gifter" was one of the best plays I've seen in a long time! Kudos and kudos to everyone involved!!!!
Going to see "The {Re} Gifter" tonight at VCC.
is eating some sort of pasta. I have no idea what it's called but it's DELICIOUS!!!!!!
Spending the morning at the Vineyard ... Jeff and Alton are soooooo funny!! :)
Volunteering @ the Student Union, yo!!!
Spending the day with Bethany and Jenn! Volunteering at the Student Union later!
"Imagine all the people sharing for the world. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one."
Two rooms down, two rooms to go ... Gosh I've been at it since noon! How is my iPod still alive!?
Has her iPod and a "can do" attitude and is ready to clean the house!!!
is beginning to feel like a parent and doesn't like it at all ...
Excited that Brian Buchanan finally got a Twitter!!!!
Loves random hugs and kisses from her nephew!!!!
Thanks for voting!
